attributes.action: 'persuade' Mr Speaker to stand down with immediate effect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Michael Martin has stated that he will not leave his post early because he will not get all the money he claims he has a right to.  He has already had a lot more than he has a right to, so make him go now

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
